TutorialStep.Instructions:
# This example shows how to initialize breeze and create and run a very simple query.
## In the box below, you should click "Run".

So let's make the query a bit more complicated by adding an "orderBy" clause.
Simply replace this query
> var query = new entityModel.EntityQuery() > .from("Todos")
with this query
> var query = new entityModel.EntityQuery() > .from("Todos") > .orderBy("CreatedAt");
